source.title: Deliberation and commitment in the premotor and primary motor cortex during dynamic decision making

confidence_rationale: Directly measures deliberation-to-commitment transitions in action circuits, aligning with MECH-025 action-mode commitment framing.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Neural activity in premotor and motor cortex tracks deliberation and converges during commitment in dynamic action decisions.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports MECH-025 claim that action mode is characterized by short-horizon commitment dynamics linked to action enaction pathways.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Circuit-level findings do not independently specify REE control-plane precision routing knobs.
mapping.source_context: Action decision neurophysiology linking deliberation and commitment in sensorimotor cortex.

confidence_components.notes: Strong mechanistic relevance to commitment timing in action mode.
